title: Microsoft, SpaceX, Airbnb and Others Offer Ukraine Assistance
sub_head: Some Western businesses are providing tech, internet and housing support during Russia’s assault
body:
Western companies including Microsoft Corp. , GlaxoSmithKline PLC and SpaceX are offering assistance to Ukraine, helping guard against cyberattacks, providing painkillers and setting up internet services amid Russia’s continuing assault.
Some of the efforts go beyond contributing humanitarian assistance or extending financial support to aid groups, with broader moves that could complicate companies’ relationships with Russia or risk reputational damage should the endeavors fail.
